past jenova(egg) join vincent shinra house vincent(present) shinra under(awake) nivl reactor nivl reactor out(with tifa) nivl mt entrance(past) Materia cave new event sininb34 new event sininb35 new midgal nivgate ()
plate down meeting caught dead president app rufaus after heli
7 pillar kolneo under high way 5 out airport(gelnica) after fire cefiros jairo sky jairo sea junon cannon junon medical ()
cancel bone after arma san dun sleep forest ancent forest lost lake water pray dead rocket(first) bone first bone luna los in
[Save Point] Access the Menu and select [SAVE] to save your game.
white white boogen(key) white boogen(no key) before after white2 junonn in2
Biggs "Wow! You used to be in SOLDIER all right! ...Not everyday ya find one in a group like AVALANCHE."
Jessie "What's he doing with us in AVALANCHE?"
Biggs "He WAS in SOLDIER, Jessie.""But he quit and is with us now."
"I don't care what your names are. Once this job's over...I'm outta here."
"The hell you all doin'!? I thought I told you never to move in a group!"
"Our target's the North Mako Reactor. We'll meet on the bridge in front of it."
"Press the Directional buttons while pushing [CANCEL] to run."
Wedge "I'll secure our escape passage. You concentrate on the mission, ."
Wedge "Geez, we're really gonna blow this huge furnace up? This'll be somethin' to see!"
"Now let's go into the reactor! From here on out, you stick with me."
"Yo! This your first time in a reactor?"
"No. After all, I did work for Shinra, y'know."
"The Planet's full of Mako energy. People here use it everyday."
"It's the life blood of this Planet. But Shinra keeps suckin' the blood out with these weird machines."
"I'm not here for a lecture. Let's just do it."
"@#&^%$! From now on you come with me."
"Little by little the reactors'll drain out all the life. Then that'll be that."
"The only thing I care about is finishin' this job before security and the Roboguards come."
Biggs "I only let my guard down for a minute... And someone got behind me..."
Jessie "Biggs and I got the code for this door."
Biggs "Think how many of our people risked their lives, just for this code..."
Jessie "Push [OK] in front of a ladder to grab on to it. Then use the [Directional button] to climb up and down."
"When we blow this place, this ain't gonna be nothin' more than a hunka junk."
"Jus' do it! I gotta watch to make sure you don't pull nothin'."
Watch out! This isn't just a reactor!!
"Damn man, get a hold of yourself!"
"Let me guess... You're my chaperone, right?"
"'s old friend... That ain't good enough."
I didn't really understand what Sephiroth meant then.
I was even more surprised that Shinra was producing monsters.
Cancel cid Cloud Lock Change Party Members
opening() feel wind gate1 open T road(escape) 1reactor(5reactor) junon(yufi,R1gaiheki) ()

[Save Point] Access the Menu and select [SAVE] to save your game.
white white boogen(key) white boogen(no key) before after white2 junonn in2
Biggs "Wow! You used to be in SOLDIER all right! ...Not everyday ya find one in a group like AVALANCHE."
Jessie "What's he doing with us in AVALANCHE?"
Biggs "He WAS in SOLDIER, Jessie.""But he quit and is with us now."
"I don't care what your names are. Once this job's over...I'm outta here."
"The hell you all doin'!? I thought I told you never to move in a group!"
"Our target's the North Mako Reactor. We'll meet on the bridge in front of it."
"Press the Directional buttons while pressing [CANCEL] to run."
Wedge "I'll secure our escape passage. You concentrate on the mission, ."
Wedge "Geez, we're really gonna blow this huge furnace up? This'll be somethin' to see!"
"Now let's go into the reactor! From here on out, you stick with me."
"Yo! This your first time in a reactor?"
"No. After all, I did work for Shinra, y'know."
"The planet's full of Mako energy. People here use it everyday."
"It's the life blood of this planet. But Shinra keeps suckin' the blood out with these weird machines."
"I'm not here for a lecture. Let's just do it."
"Alright! You come with me from now on."
"Little by little the reactors are draining out all the life. And that'll be that."
"The only thing I care about is finishin' this job before security and the Roboguards come."
Biggs "I just let my guard down for a minute... And someone got behind me..."
Jessie "Biggs and I got the code for this door."
Biggs "Think how many of our people risked their lives, just for this code..."
Jessie "Push the [OK] button in front of a ladder to grab on to it. Then use the [Directional button] to climb up and down."
"When we blow this place, it ain't gonna be nothin' more than a hunka junk."
"Jus' do it! I gotta watch to make sure you don't pull nothin'."
Watch out! This isn't just a reactor!!
"Damn man, get a hold of yourself!"
"'s old friend... That ain't good enough."
I didn't really understand what Sephiroth meant then.
I was even more surprised that Shinra was producing monsters.
"Alright, now let's get out of here."
"Rendezvous at Sector 8 station! Split up and get on the train!"
"If it's about your money, wait 'til we get back."
Biggs "That should keep the planet going... at least a little longer."

"It's the life blood of this planet. But Shinra keeps suckin' the blood out with these weird machines."
"I'm not here for a lecture. Let's just do it."
"Alright! You come with me from now on."
"Little by little the reactors are draining out all the life. And that'll be that."
"The only thing I care about is finishin' this job before security and the Roboguards come."
Biggs "I just let my guard down for a minute... And someone got behind me..."
Jessie "Biggs and I got the code for this door."
Biggs "Think how many of our people risked their lives, just for this code..."
Jessie "Push [OK] in front of a ladder to grab on to it. Then use the [Directional button] to climb up and down."
"When we blow this place, it ain't gonna be nothin' more than a hunka junk."
"Jus' do it! I gotta watch to make sure you don't pull nothin'."
Watch out! This isn't just a reactor!!
"Damn man, get a hold of yourself!"
"'s old friend... That ain't good enough."
I didn't really understand what Sephiroth meant then.
I was even more surprised that Shinra was producing monsters.
Jessie "This is a complete model of the city of Midgar.""It's about a 1/10000 scale.""The top plate is about 50 meters above ground."
"A main pillar supports the plate in the center, and there are other support pillars built in each section..."

"Psst...whisper...whisper... (The No. 1 Reactor we blew up was in the northern section.)""Then there's No. 2, No. 3 all the way up to the No. 8 Reactor.""The 8 Reactors provide Midgar with electricity."
"Each town used to have a name, but no one in Midgar remembers them.""Instead of names, we refer to them by numbered sectors. That's how things turned out."

Jessie "This is the route this train is on.""The route spirals around the main pillar.""We should be coming around the center, right now.""Each checkpoint has an ID sensor device.""It checks the identities and backgrounds of each passenger on the train and is linked up to the central data bank at Shinra headquarters."
"Whisper...whisper... (We definitely look suspicious, so we're using fake IDs.)"

"Dunno. Probably 'cuz they ain't got no money. Or, maybe..."
"'Cuz they love their land, no matter how polluted it gets."

Jessie "I know!""Next time, I'll make one just for you." Thanks anyway Looking forward to it

"Huh? This is my house, so make yourselves at home."
"...mumble...grumble... (...Reactor's blown to bits... ...Bad things one after another... ...What a day!)"

"You see the headlines in the Shinra Times?""The terrorists that bombed the No. 1 Reactor are based somewhere in the slums.""...Blowing up a Reactor... they sure put some thought into this one.""They must have a real calculating leader. I wonder what they'll do next?"
"This ain't no private car!! So split up!!"
"...Hoodlums again. God, don't I just have all the luck?"

"It..it's empty because of... g, guys like you..."

Shinra Manager "I won't give in to violence... and I'm not giving you my seat either!"
"So, what are we gonna do now?"
"@#$%! The hell you so calm? You're bustin' up my rhythm!"
